title: Google Site Flavored Search
body: <p><!-- Site-Flavored Google Search --><input id="google_site_flavored_hm" type="hidden" name="hm" value="http%3A//travis.servebeer.com/blog.net/" /><a href="http://labs.google.com/personalized/"><img src="http://labs.google.com/images/gp/google_kaltix_site_flavored_searchbox.gif" border="0" alt="Google" /></a><br /><input id="google_site_flavored_q" type="text" name="q" size="31" maxlength="255" value="" /><input id="google_site_flavored_tid" type="hidden" name="tid" value="1" /><input id="google_site_flavored_in" type="hidden" name="in" value="145,154,221,114,134,124,135,57,58,60,1222,62,65,40,1220,122" /><input id="google_site_flavored_sa" type="button" name="sa" value="Custom Search" onclick="document.location='http://labs.google.com/personalized/search?q='+document.getElementById('google_site_flavored_q').value+'&amp;hm='+escape(document.location)+'&amp;tid='+document.getElementById('google_site_flavored_tid').value+'&amp;in='+document.getElementById('google_site_flavored_in').value+'&amp;sa='+document.getElementById('google_site_flavored_sa').value;" /><!-- Site-Flavored Google Search -->It's kinda neat.  They have a <a href="http://labs.google.com/personalized/customize.html" title="all the wizzizzards in the kizzastle">wizard to generate code for you</a>.  If you <a href="view-source:http://travis.servebeer.com/blog.net/archive/2004/11/01/google_site_flavored_search.aspx" title="view-source:you leet haxor">view-source</a>, you'll see the code I used is slightly different.</p>
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-11-01

Google Site Flavored Search
all the wizzizzards in the kizzastle
